definition: to evade/to dodge (out of the way)

to dodge/to duck out of the way/to beat it/shaken (by a fall)/to sprain/to pull a muscle/lightning/spark/a flash/to flash (across one's mind)/to leave behind/(Internet slang) (of a display of affection) "dazzlingly" saccharine

sentences.english: Eg. For the second time in her life she made an indirect answer.
sentences.chinese: 這是她有生以來第二次說話躲躲閃閃。

sentences.english: The lonely man skulks down the main street all day.
sentences.chinese: 這個孤獨的人整天在這條大街上躲躲閃閃。

sentences.english: For the second time in her life she made an indirect answer.
sentences.chinese: 這是她有生以來第二次說話躲躲閃閃。

sentences.english: I wasn't evasive in my reply.
sentences.chinese: 我的回答並不躲躲閃閃。

sentences.english: Don't play the games that U play.
sentences.chinese: 不要再躲躲閃閃的玩愛情遊戲。

sentences.english: This is my first child. He has not seen any society, so he is always shy and awkward.
sentences.chinese: 這是第一個孩子，沒有見過世面，老是躲躲閃閃的。

sentences.english: Do these businesses, chinese network is allied never shifty-eyed .
sentences.chinese: 做這些事情，中國網絡聯盟從不躲躲閃閃。
